A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The \"Star Wars\" title alone gave this movie 3 stars. However\, the characters were written so poorly that I can't in good conscience give it that rating. Luke behaved like Han in this movie and made me sympathetic to the franchise's top villain\, Kylo Ren. The established  \"flirt-mance\" between hero leads Rey and Finn was scrapped in favor of a Rey/Kylo flirt-mance\, which makes zero sense. While The Force Awakens left several intriguing plot lines unanswered\, TLJ more or less finished them all off with a collective whimper\, leaving me curious as to why I spent the last two years anticipating a satisfying resolution. I have no idea where the Star Wars Saga will go from here\, and I'm not sure I want to know. Major\, major disappointment.
